name: Purgatory (itch) (Cpargy)
description:
Submission for Wowie Gam Jam 3.0.

Pugatory is a collection puzzle game with a twist due to the game jams theme of failure is progress.

All game art, mechanics and the soundtrack were designed by me.

This is my first ever game jam and first game I have finished. Was a super fun time and hope you enjoy Purgatory!

Additonal Information below.

Controls:

  • WASD to move

Game Hints:

  • Use the door as a hint for the keys

Assests used:

  • Pixeled font by OmegaPC777
